com.arm.mbed.cloud.sdk.common.dao

Class AbstractCloudDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.arm.mbed.cloud.sdk.common.dao.AbstractCloudDao
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CloudDao, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractModelDao, AbstractModelListDao

    @Preamble(description="Abstract Cloud DAO")
 @Internal
public abstract class AbstractCloudDao
extends java.lang.Object
implements CloudDao
    Abstract definition of a Cloud Data Access Object.
